payload.query: Deploy initial worker agent pool with 3 specialized workers per master category (15 total). Worker distribution: Development (Code Analysis, Testing/QA, Documentation), Security (Vulnerability Assessment, Compliance, Threat Analysis), Infrastructure (Monitoring, Deployment, Configuration), Inventory (Asset Discovery, Dependency Mapping, License Management), CI/CD (Pipeline Orchestration, Build, Test Automation). Configure worker registration with appropriate master agents. Implement worker health monitoring and auto-restart capabilities.
payload.title: PHASE 1.3: Deploy Worker Agent Pool - Initial 15 Workers (3 per category)

result.answer: I see. Let me check what I can do with the cortex-resource-manager API, which appears to be designed for managing resources:
